title: Notes by the Way; or, what I saw in my rambles
author: Higginson, H. Talbot.
snippet: about £7,000 ; and two—one new—Presbyterian churches in MainStreet, a new Roman Catholic chapel, and a Methodist chapel. TheMarket House in Main Street has been converted into the Ward Schools,and there are Masonic, Orange, Good Templar, and Salvation ArmyHalls, all very good of their sort, but quite too small for public meetingsfor the number of inhabitants Bangor has at present.
